about.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral,
platform-neutral, extensible mechanism for serializing structured data-
think XML, but smaller, faster, and simpler.
about.summary: Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format. C++ Libraries and protoc, the protobuf compiler.

name: libprotobuf-static
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: libprotobuf-static
  version: 3.18.1
source:
  - patches:
      - 0001-remove-Werror-from-test-flags.patch
    sha256: 9111bf0b542b631165fadbd80aa60e7fb25b25311c532139ed2089d76ddf6dd7
    url: https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/archive/v3.18.1/libprotobuf-v3.18.1.tar.gz
  - folder: third_party/benchmark
    sha256: 5dc92703f811f94e2aa63bdab07ab749f28a094befa6cdfd5fe177f947590a48
    url: https://github.com/google/benchmark/archive/5b7683f49e1e9223cf9927b24f6fd3d6bd82e3f8.tar.gz
  - folder: third_party/googletest
    sha256: 0e2f36e8e403c125fd0ab02171bdb786d3b6b3875b6ccf3b2eb7969be8faecd0
    url: https://github.com/google/googletest/archive/5ec7f0c4a113e2f18ac2c6cc7df51ad6afc24081.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '0'
  script: build_static.sh
  string: h690f14c_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
    - autoconf 2.69 pl5320h36c2ea0_10
    - automake 1.16.2 pl5320ha770c72_3
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.36.1 h193b22a_2
    - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.36.1 h17f093b_2
    - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.36 h5e27e69_1
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 9.4.0 h03d3576_9
    - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 h10ae0d0_9
    - gcc_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 hf801c13_1
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 9.4.0 h03d3576_9
    - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 h10ae0d0_9
    - gxx_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 ha72065e_1
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 he073ed8_14
    - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 h23d7e6c_12
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.36.1 hea4e1c9_2
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.36.1 h8031a8f_2
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 9.4.0 hd854feb_9
    - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 h60c1801_9
    - libgcc-ng 11.2.0 h1d223b6_9
    - libgomp 11.2.0 h1d223b6_9
    - libsanitizer 9.4.0 h79bfe98_9
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 9.4.0 hd854feb_9
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-ppc64le 9.4.0 h60c1801_9
    - libstdcxx-ng 11.2.0 he4da1e4_9
    - libtool 2.4.6 h9c3ff4c_1008
    - m4 1.4.18 h516909a_1001
    - make 4.3 hd18ef5c_1
    - perl 5.32.1 0_h7f98852_perl5
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 h36c2ea0_1008
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 he073ed8_14
    - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h395ec9b_12
    - unzip 6.0 h7f98852_2
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 11.2.0 h7698a5e_9
    - libgomp 11.2.0 h7698a5e_9
    - libprotobuf 3.18.1 h690f14c_0
    - libstdcxx-ng 11.2.0 habdf983_9
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h339bb43_1013
    - zlib 1.2.11 h339bb43_1013
  run:
    - libgcc-ng >=9.4.0
    - libprotobuf 3.18.1 h690f14c_0
    - libstdcxx-ng >=9.4.0
    - libzlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
    - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotobuf.a
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotobuf-lite.a
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libprotoc.a
about:
  description: 'Protocol buffers are Google''s language-neutral,

    platform-neutral, extensible mechanism for serializing structured data-

    think XML, but smaller, faster, and simpler.

    '
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/releases
  doc_url: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
  home: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format. C++ Libraries and
    protoc, the protobuf compiler.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dopplershift
    - hajapy
    - jakirkham
    - ocefpaf
    - wesm
    - xhochy
